H0.text: Which group has had hits with the albums 'Hopes and Fears', and `Under the Iron Sea'. Coldplay

H1.text: Which group has had hits with the albums 'Hopes and Fears', and `Under the Iron Sea'. Snow Patrol

H2.text: Which group has had hits with the albums 'Hopes and Fears', and `Under the Iron Sea'. The Script

H3.text: Which group has had hits with the albums 'Hopes and Fears', and `Under the Iron Sea'. Keane

A4.text: Keane's debut album Hopes and Fears was released on 10 May 2004 in the UK, a day before the band started their first world tour.

A5.text: Under the Iron Sea (2006), topped the UK chart and debuted at number four on the US Billboard 200.
